titles.title: A joint resolution to designate the week beginning September 11, 1988, as "Let's Face It Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 5/2/1988--Introduced. Designates the week beginning September 11, 1988, as Let's Face It Week. (Let's Face It is a mutual support organization for individuals who have facial disfigurements, their families, and professionals who work with them.)
